text: Soignies (; , ) is a municipality in the Belgian province of Hainaut. In 2007, 25700 people lived there. It is at 50° 34 North, 04° 04 East. == References == ==Other websites== *Official website *Alternative site, with lots of further information on the city *Soignies, City of St Vincent Category:Municipalities of Hainaut
title: Soignies
